after I sign in and go to view and pay bills, it brings me back to sign again, it continues to go in circles, it was working ok up to Friday 11,2011

Thank you very much

Reproducible: Always

Steps to Reproduce:
1.sign it user name and pass word
2.go to view and pay bills
3.takes you back to sign in 
Actual Results:  
nothing, it brings me back to sign in again

Expected Results:  
it should have taken me to view and pay bills

if I have to I can use Safari but I shouldn't have to as I have been using Firefox for quite awhile
comments.creator: cadillac@ne.rr.com
